name: MagicTurn4
commands: Mages like Schuri don't use weapons, they use spells.|Spells can be used from both 1 range and 2 range.|They use the user's magic + spell damage - enemy resistance.|A long time ago, there used to be older magics called Light and Dark magic.|They're superior to the magic we use today, anima magic.|But no one can use the magic anymore so that's more of a history lesson for you.

In some rare cases like Schuri, mages can also learn healing magic.|Schuri can heal allies but not herself.|To heal an ally, Schuri has to be next to the injured ally,|Then use the correct healing spell to heal.
While we're on the topic of healing,|let's also explain another way of healing.

Some items you'll encounter can be used to heal the unit that uses it.|You obviously can't be at full HP to use it so|Let's pretend you're at 10 HP {var:MC_name}.|Select yourself and move to a safe space to open up your item menu.|Navigate to the Vulnerary item and select it.|Select 'Use' in order to heal.|Next turn we'll end our training by discussing terrain.
